description.value:
While moving, you can spend 5 feet of movement rolling into a loop so that you begin rolling on your armored spine. While moving in this wheel shape, you gain an additional 5ft of movement, even on rough terrain.
While in this form, if you roll at least 15 feet and then ram into a creature, they must succeed on a Dexterity (Save) check or take 1d6 bludgeoning damage per 15 feet traveled before collision.
